subtitle: what was rotten wrong and misguided will
be snuffed out with the light of Truth
and those who started the storm will
storm do not forget I came to show you
what was possible in you for the kingdom
of God is within you all of you the law
of cause and effect brings results
accordingly and All Humans who have
forgotten the cosmic laws are swiftly
being reminded of this by experiencing
the suffering they caused you could say
the Lords of Karma are working over time
indeed God knows neither Revenge nor
retribution God is love I wish to remind
you that I am not Christian nor am I of
any religion yet they all embody a
sliver of Truth and that truth is Trust
